fields.title: We are a software consultancy specialising in designing, building and supporting complex online IT solutions.

content.value: With over 20 years in supporting some of the biggest names in healthcare, we have, and continue to build software to help these organisations deliver better healthcare to their customers. Come and see some of our work.

We work on all aspects of Shopify! whether you require a simple touch up to your existing website design, a new feature to improve your work experience or to integrate your data in Shopify with your own internal systems, we have a wealth of experience in these areas.

fields.title: We have worked with companies like LloydsPharmacy and the NHS over the last 15 years to help revolutionise online healthcare.

fields.navigationDescription: Our own application to handle your companies appointment offerings. Our easy to use administrative interface allows you to create your appointment types and availability, assign questionnaires for customers to complete if required and view your upcoming schedule and much more.

fields.column1Title: A completely bespoke appointment booking app designed and developed from the ground up

fields.title: Feels like a native part of your website or app
fields.description:
We have designed our appointment booking application to work with any type of website or app that your business offers. Not only that, we can style the user interfaces to match your brand so that our platform feels like your own.

No website? No problem. It can also run as a standalone service without the need of a website or app integration.

fields.title: Questionnaire builder
fields.description: When you require information from a customer prior to an appointment, why not get them to provide it to you when they are making the booking? Create questionnaires for your customers to fill out when they book so when they arrive you can get started straight away. Our questionnaire builder can not only help you gather the information you need for a particular appointment, but it can also help guide a customer into choosing the right appointment for them. Customise the flow of the questionnaire based on how questions are answered to make sure you both get the data you need.

content.value: for yourself! A stylish, modern design built on a platform to support them into the future.
Even though the Shopify platform provides the majority of the functionality out of the box, we were able to get our hands dirty and build in some features ourselves.
Integration of Google Tag Manager to send event information
Integration of Algolia to power the websites search
Bespoke Shopify theme sections for content editors to shape all pages to their liking
Logic to calculate price per unit on items

fields.title: Powerful search integration
fields.description: Algolia is the power behind John Bell & Croyden's performant search functionality. We integrated the software and restyled the components to match the designs of the new website.

fields.title: We can help you through all stages of your next project.

content.value: The heart of what we do. Our team has built many applications that have helped our clients achieve their goals and ambitions.
The key to a successful software application, starts with a good design. Our experienced developers will work with you to help design the systems you need to take your business to the next level.
We have built websites of all shapes and sizes over the years. Whether you need a small site for your startup or require updates to your large e-commerce platform, we can help.
Even software requires a little TLC. Whether you have a legacy system that requires security updates or the need for someone to make sure it keeps running. We can help.

Seeing is believing. With the help of the latest design software, our in-house designer can help visualise your ideas with a working prototype and make tweaks on the fly so that we can build exactly what you want.
Need to bounce some ideas around? We'll be more than happy to provide you with some advice and guidance throughout your next projects.
